mapper.insert: insert into dish set writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, ingredient=#{ingredient}, recipe=#{recipe}, url=#{url}, date = NOW(), t_time=#{t_time}, m_ingredient=#{m_ingredient}, cookery=#{cookery}, t_weather=#{t_weather}
insert into dish_picture set pname=#{pname}, dnum= (select if(dnum=null, 1, max(dnum)) from dish)
insert into dish_picture set pname=#{pname}, dnum=#{dnum}
mapper.select: select d.*, dp.pictures from dish d left outer join (select dnum, group_concat(pname) pictures from dish_picture group by dnum) dp on d.dnum = dp.dnum where d.dnum=#{dnum}
select d.*, dp.pictures from dish d left outer join (select dnum, group_concat(pname) pictures from dish_picture group by dnum) dp on d.dnum = dp.dnum
select count(*) from ate where dnum=#{dnum} and mnum=#{mnum};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dish WHERE dnum = #{dnum}; DELETE FROM dish_picture WHERE dnum = #{dnum};
mapper.insert: insert into dish_like set dnum=#{dnum}, mnum=#{mnum}
